title.en: Isami Ishii Masterpiece Collection 2: Home Run Angel

altTitles.ja: 石井いさみ傑作集2 ホームラン天使

description.en:
A super complete version with additions, corrections, and reorganization!
Two hot-blooded baseball manga drawn by Isami Ishii of "750 Rider"
First book version with additions and revisions by the author!!

In youth baseball! In high school baseball!
The sight of boys chasing a white ball is touching!

Commentary
~Isami Ishii Anthology Part 2~
A mysterious home run angel guides a baseball boy --- ``Home Run Angel''
What are the conditions to get the true ace number? -- "Mother's No. 1" Coupling Isami Ishii's friendship and tearful baseball manga!!

<Home Run Angel>
First book published in 1962
Ken, a member of the second elementary school baseball team, gets into fights. I was always scolded by my teacher.
One day, he meets a mysterious masked baseball player who he respects, Home Run Tenshi, and promises to stop fighting and become a true sportsman.
After Ken stops fighting, his teacher assigns him the role of pitcher in the next game, but a jealous upperclassman provokes him...
Can Ken become a baseball Ken instead of a fighting Ken?
A powerful youth baseball manga that will make you empathize with Ken!

<Mother's No. 1>
First book published in 1970
Aiming for Koshien in Misawa, the northern land, in the snow Koji Ota, a young boy undergoing special pitching training.
But he forgets that baseball is a team game, and his mother refuses to put the number 1 on his uniform!
Where is the number 1? A masterpiece of a high school baseball manga aiming for Koshien in a snowy country where it is said that baseball players do not grow up!
